statements: SELECT * FROM driver_schedules
SELECT driver_id, route_id, start_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE assigned_date = '2022-05-10'
SELECT route_id, assigned_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 3
SELECT driver_id, end_time, route_id FROM driver_schedules WHERE start_time < '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2022-05-10' AND '2022-05-15'
SELECT driver_id, route_id, assigned_date, start_time, end_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE route_id = 1 ORDER BY assigned_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE start_time < '09:00:00' AND end_time > '17:00:00' ORDER BY driver_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT driver_id, assigned_date, start_time FROM driver_schedules WHERE assigned_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-01-31' ORDER BY start_time ASC, assigned_date ASC LIMIT 3
SELECT * FROM driver_schedules WHERE driver_id = 3 AND route_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY assigned_date ASC, start_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT driver_id, route_id FROM driver_schedules WHERE start_time >= '08:00:00' AND end_time <= '18:00:00' ORDER BY route_id ASC, driver_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM DriverSchedule
SELECT driver_id, day_of_week FROM DriverSchedule
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM FleetRoutes
SELECT * FROM FleetRoutes WHERE route_id = 1
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM FleetRoutes ORDER BY distance DESC
SELECT route_id, route_name, distance FROM FleetRoutes WHERE distance > 100 ORDER BY distance DESC, route_name ASC
SELECT driver_id, route_id, day_of_week, assigned_time FROM DriverSchedule WHERE day_of_week = 'Monday' ORDER BY assigned_time ASC
SELECT driver_id, route_id, day_of_week, assigned_time FROM DriverSchedule WHERE driver_id = 3 ORDER BY day_of_week DESC, assigned_time ASC
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location FROM FleetRoutes WHERE start_location = 'New York' ORDER BY route_id
SELECT driver_id, route_id, day_of_week, assigned_time FROM DriverSchedule WHERE day_of_week IN ('Monday', 'Tuesday') ORDER BY driver_id, day_of_week ASC
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM driver_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM fleet_route WHERE route_id = 3;
SELECT assignment_id, driver_id, route_id FROM assignment WHERE assignment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule JOIN assignment ON driver_schedule.driver_id = assignment.driver_id;
SELECT * FROM assignment WHERE assignment_id = 1;
SELECT driver_id, schedule_date FROM driver_schedule WHERE driver_id = 3 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM fleet_route WHERE route_name LIKE '%Express%' ORDER BY route_id;

SELECT assignment.assignment_id, assignment_date, driver_schedule.schedule_date, route_name FROM assignment JOIN driver_schedule ON assignment.driver_id = driver_schedule.driver_id JOIN fleet_route ON assignment.route_id = fleet_route.route_id WHERE assignment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT driver_id, route_id, COUNT(assignment_id) AS num_assignments FROM assignment GROUP BY driver_id, route_id HAVING num_assignments > 1 ORDER BY num_assignments DESC, driver_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM driver_schedule;
SELECT driver_id, route_id, date FROM driver_schedule;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM fleet_routes;
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_license FROM driver_details;
SELECT * FROM assigned_routes;
SELECT route_id, route_name FROM fleet_routes
SELECT driver_id, driver_name, driver_license FROM driver_details
SELECT * FROM assigned_routes
SELECT driver_id, route_id, assigned_date FROM assigned_routes ORDER BY assigned_date DESC

SELECT assigned_date, driver_name, route_name FROM assigned_routes INNER JOIN driver_details ON assigned_routes.driver_id = driver_details.driver_id INNER JOIN fleet_routes ON assigned_routes.route_id = fleet_routes.route_id
SELECT * FROM drivers;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT route_id, route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE end_location = 'City';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_capacity > 5;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date FROM assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM drivers WHERE driver_id = 1;
SELECT driver_name, phone_number FROM drivers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_capacity FROM vehicles WHERE vehicle_capacity > 5;
SELECT route_name, start_location, end_location FROM routes WHERE start_location = 'City A' AND end_location = 'City B';
SELECT schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
